Key Match Events: Moeen Ali hits quickfire 63 off 28 balls
Nicholas Pooran eventually hammered Livingstone over long on at the start of the 14th over
Both Jason Roy and Moeen accelerate impressively after pedestrian starts
Roy raises his bat to celebrate a half-century
Moeen delivers just the second half-century by an England skipper in 28 matches since August 2020
Pre-Game Insights: Before this game Moeen Ali blamed England’s defeat in the third match of the five-game series on the fact they had to bowl eight overs of heavily punished spin
Post-Match Reflections: Moeen’s 28-ball 63, and in particular his vicious assault on a single Jason Holder over, was instrumental in hauling the tourists to a competitive total
When you’re captain you tend to underbowl yourself and today I thought it was a good situation for me to have a go – Moeen Ali
